subject: Family Fun at The BALSAMS
body:
eTarget 5/22 e-mail
















					Golf. Swimming. Safaris. Campfires. Fun. 
					IT'S ALL UP HERE.









								  Family
								  Fun
								  
								  Package
starting from
$298*
per family


From our special Camp Wind Whistle children's programs to live
							  entertainment to fun and activities for the entire family, The BALSAMS
							  has always been an ideal destination for summer vacations. This year
							  it's even easier to plan your family outing with our new Family
							  Fun Package!
Enjoy an unforgettable vacation whether you're a kid, or just
							  a kid at heart. Starting at $298 per family, you'll enjoy comfortable
							  accommodations in a two-bedroom suite for up to four people, a delicious
							  breakfast, access to almost every one of our resort activities, plus
							  free cookies and a stuffed moose for all the kids.
Other great offers are also available. Visit
						      us online to learn more.





BOOK NOW




					  Reserving your mountain experience at The BALSAMS is easy. 
					  Book online at TheBalsams.com or call 866-550-0829.
						








*Family Fun Package is valid Sunday - Thursday, Memorial
		    Day through Labor Day, and subject to availability. Restrictions apply.
		    



 


								  Hospitality by Delaware North Companies Parks & Resorts, Inc.
								© 2007 DNC Parks & Resorts at The BALSAMS, LLC
								1000 Cold Spring Rd. Dixville Notch, NH 03576
